title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Multi-Document Controversial Topic Learning Strategy—Source Information Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate information from at least five credible sources on a given controversial topic.
Learners can construct argument structures differently depending on the placement method of source information (integrated/separated, presented before/after).
Learners can clearly identify conflicting claims between sources in project deliverables and derive comprehensive conclusions based on scientific evidence.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
